```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
n <- 10000
set.seed(1441)
dat <- data.frame(id = n + seq(n),
                  icd_dx1 = sample(icd10cm2016$code, n, replace = TRUE),
                  icd_dx2 = sample(icd10cm2016$code, n, replace = TRUE),
                  icd_pcs1 = sample(icd10_pcs_2018$pcs, n, replace = TRUE),
                  icd_pcs2 = sample(icd10_pcs_2018$pcs, n, replace = TRUE)
)

```

## Preparing the data

The following sample data has two columns for ICD-10 diagnostic code, and two for ICD-10 procedure codes.

```{r prep}
head(dat)

dx <- icd::wide_to_long(dat[1:3])
pcs <- icd::wide_to_long(dat[c(1, 4:5)], icd_name = "pcs", icd_regex = "icd_pcs")

pccc_dx <- icd::comorbid_pccc_dx(dx)
pccc_pcs <- icd::comorbid_pccc_pcs(pcs)
```
